Long Label: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
Extended Description: Eradicate poverty, focusing on the most vulnerable, and ensuring equal access to resources and economic support systems.

Long Label: End hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
Extended Description: End hunger and malnutrition by ensuring sustainable food production systems, increasing agricultural productivity, and addressing the needs of rural communities.

Long Label: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
Extended Description: Improve health by reducing maternal mortality, combating diseases, improving mental health, and ensuring universal health coverage.

Long Label: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
Extended Description: Promote lifelong learning and equitable access to quality education at all levels, including primary, secondary, and higher education.

Long Label: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Extended Description: Eliminate gender discrimination, violence, and inequality in access to education, health, and political representation.

Long Label: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
Extended Description: Ensure access to clean water and sanitation, promote sustainable water management, and prevent water scarcity.

Long Label: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
Extended Description: Expand access to reliable, renewable energy sources while promoting energy efficiency and sustainable infrastructure.

Long Label: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
Extended Description: Encourage inclusive and sustainable economic growth, promote productive employment, and ensure decent work conditions for everyone.

Long Label: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization, and foster innovation
Extended Description: Develop resilient infrastructure, advance sustainable industrial growth, and foster innovation to drive economic progress.

Long Label: Reduce inequality within and among countries
Extended Description: Reduce inequality within and among countries by improving social, economic, and political inclusion.

Long Label: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable
Extended Description: Promote sustainable urban development and infrastructure to ensure that cities are safe, inclusive, and resilient.

Long Label: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
Extended Description: Promote responsible resource use, reduce waste, and encourage sustainable consumption and production.

Long Label: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
Extended Description: Combat climate change by lowering greenhouse gas emissions and increasing resilience to climate-related hazards.

Long Label: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas, and marine resources for sustainable development
Extended Description: Protect marine ecosystems, reduce ocean pollution, and sustainably manage marine resources to preserve biodiversity.

Long Label: Protect, restore, and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, manage forests, combat desertification, and halt biodiversity loss
Extended Description: Conserve terrestrial ecosystems, prevent land degradation, and protect biodiversity and ecosystems.

Long Label: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies, ensure access to justice for all, and build effective, accountable institutions
Extended Description: Build peaceful, just, and inclusive societies by providing access to justice and ensuring strong, accountable institutions.

Long Label: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
Extended Description: Foster global partnerships and collaboration to achieve the SDGs, mobilize resources, and share knowledge.
